title: 46 perches bare land with sea view for sale (one 24 perches and two 11 perches each)
details:
46 perches of bare land for sale
Situated in Trincomalee town on Inner Harbor Road with a beautiful view of the natural harbor.

3 lots identified in attached sketch of the land as:
Lot 1 - 24 perches on road side
Lot 2 - 11 perches
Lot 3 - 11 perches
* We have now decided to sell the plots separately or together

17 km from Nilaveli
5 Km from Uppuveli
3 km from Trincomalee railway station
2 km from Trincomalee central bus station
1 km from Trincomalee hospital

Clear deed and survey plan.
Please call or send email for more information.

Additional phone number i UK 00447515735571
